segments.en: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of visiting families.

segments.pli: Anāmantacāre āpajjati, raho nisajjāya āpajjati, paṭicchanne āsane āpajjati, mātugāmassa uttari chappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ desento āpajjati, kāmasaṅkappabahulo viharati.
segments.en: You fall into an offense for wandering without leave. You fall into an offense for sitting in a private place with someone of the opposite sex. You fall into an offense for sitting in a hidden place with someone of the opposite sex. You fall into an offense for teaching more than five or six sentences to someone of the opposite sex. You have a lot of sensual thoughts.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā kulūpake”ti.
segments.en: These are the five drawbacks of visiting families.”
